name: refrigeratorOption_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off a specified option on a refrigerator.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the specified option on the refrigerator.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The option to be turned off on the refrigerator (e.g., welcome light).
